author: BS Reporter
title: RBI revises risk weight, loan to value ratio norms home loans News
text:
Reserve Bank of India (RBI) eased the risk weights for individual home loans with lower loan to value (LTV) ratio. For loans up to Rs 30 lakh, risk weight will be 35% when LTV is upto 80%.

If LTV for loans is between 80-90%, risk weight would be 50%.
According to RBI earlier all loans up to Rs 20 lakh with LTV of 90% attracted 50% risk weight.
In loan bucket between Rs 30-75 lakh, risk weight will be 35% for LTV is upto 75%. For LTV between 75-80%, risk weight would be 50%.
For all loans above Rs 75 lakh, with LTV upto 75 risk weight is 75%, RBI added.
